item.title: Amazon Comprehend Medical and AI in Healthcare
item.description: Amazon Comprehend Medical and AI in Healthcare Ben Guzman*, Isabel Metzger, Yin Aphinyanaphongs, Himanshu Grover* The field of medicine is undergoing a massive transformation with widespread adoption and meaningful use of health information technology, promoted by the HITECH (Health Information Technology for Economic and Clinical Health) Act of 2009. With clinical practice now becoming increasingly data-driven, new tools powered by machine learning and artificial intelligence are being mobilized to solve tough problems.
